price: 26. Koros Racmaan kinni Rabbi xaylo hay site itte, Malayka Kay say-xayló axcuk, Yalli tohuk saytunnooweh, wonna hinna usun (Malayka kinnuk) Yallih naqoosay Yalli yessekexxee kinni.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
